text: Stanisław Kogut (29 October 1953 – 18 October 2020) was a Polish politician and trade union activist. He was a member of the Polish Senate between 2005 to 2019. He also was a member of the Law and Justice party. Kogut was born in Biała Niżna, Poland. Kogut died from COVID-19 on 18 October 2020 in Gorlice, Poland, aged 67. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Poland
title: Stanisław Kogut
